New Records: CJ McCollum tied a career-high with 50 points
Key Match Events: Pelicans started the third quarter off on a 14-2 run
Pelicans held the Wizards to 23 points in the fourth quarter
Pre-Game Insights: Pelicans want to win games and make fans proud
Pelicans are working hard behind the scenes and understand there is a lot of season left
Post-Match Reflections: CJ McCollum was incredible tonight and hit tough and easy shots
Pelicans managed to get more stops in the second half than the Wizards did
Pelicans will get back to the game plan and figure out how to stack some wins
Miscellaneous Highlights: CJ McCollum was interviewed by Trey Murphy III and Jose Alvarado after the game
There are photos of the locker room and postgame reactions available
